landing.title: Thola Iqembu Elikufanela Kwezepolitiki
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo mayelana nemibono yakho yezepolitiki bese uthola ukuthi yiliphi iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika elihambisana nezimiso zakho.
landing.privacy: Izimpendulo zakho zigcinwa kudivayisi yakho kuphela futhi azabelwanga.

howItHelps.title: Indlela Leli Thuluzi Elikusizayo Ngayo
howItHelps.intro: Qonda imipela ukuthi umephi ukuze uvote engenhloso ethile. Qhathanisa imibono yakho nezikhundla ezibonakalayo zamaqembu.

benefit1.title: Susa umsindo wezithembiso
benefit1.text: Umanele izithembiso zenkampani; bheka imibono elinele yanoma iyiphi iqembu emicimbi yangempela.

benefit2.title: Thola amaqembu angakubhekisili
benefit2.text: Thola amaqembu ongase ungawabheki rhoqo ngokubheka izinqubomgomo zawo zabonakalyo, hhayi udumo noma icebo enje.

benefit3.title: Bona wonke izinketho zakho
benefit3.text: Thola uhlu oluhlelwe lwamaqembu engu-11 alinganiswe ngamanqampuna, ugxile kuzinketho zakho eziphambili nezinye ezikhethekayo.

benefit4.title: Vota ngengenelelo
benefit4.text: Yenza isinqumo senolwazi esisekelwe ekudateni. Imibono yakho iqhathanisiwe nezikhundla zangempela zamaqembu ukuze ubone obubili.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa indlela ebanzi, esekelweobufakazi, yokuhambanisa imibono yakho nezikhundla zamaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika. Uhlelo lwakhiwe ukuze lube nolungile, lusobala, futhi lungakhethi.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engu-41 ehleliwe eqoqa izinkinga ezinkulu zenqubomgomo ezifaka ukunakekelwa kwempilo, imfundo, umnotho, ukuphatha kanye nezindaba zomphakathi. Umbuzo ngamunye udizayinwe ukuveza izintandokazi zakho ngaphandle kokucwasa.
about.scoringText: Impendulo yakho ngayinye iyalinganiswa nezikhundla ezibhaliwe zamaqembu ezitholakala kumamanifesto, imibhalo yenqubomgomo nezitatimende zomphakathi. Amaqembu athola amaphuzu ahlelwe ngokusondeleka kwezikhundla zawo neziphendulo zakho. Sisebenzisa i-normalisation ngamaqembu ngalinye ukuze iqembu ngalinye likalwe ngokulingana, kuqinisekiswe ukuhlinzekwa okulungile kumabhendi ahlukene. Amanqampuna aguqulwa abe isikali sika-0 kuya ku-100, futhi kukhona nesilinganiso sokuzethemba ukukusiza uqonde amandla okuvumelana.
about.transparencyText: Izikhundla zamaqembu kanye nezisindo zokubala zinqunywa ngocwaningo olunzulu lwemibhalo esemthethweni. Indlela yethu ivulekile ukuze ibuyekezwe. Asisekeli noma yiliphi iqembu; inhloso wukukunika ulwazi oluthembekile noluzimele.
about.dataSourcesText: Sisebenzisa imibhalo esemthethweni yamaqembu, amarekhodi okuvota ephalamende nezitatimende ezihloniphekile. Sibuyekeza idatha njalo ukuze ibonise izinguquko zenqubomgomo. Uma ubona iphutha, wamukela izilungiso ezinemibhalo efanele.
about.privacyText: Ubumfihlo bakho bubalulekile. Sicabangela imibono yakho yezepolitiki njengento yobumfihlo efanelwe ukuvikelwa okuphezulu.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi amakuki, ama-analytics pixels noma ubuchwepheshe bokulandelela. Asikwazi ukubona izimpendulo zakho noma ukukuhlonza. Izimpendulo zakho azithunyelwa kumaseva ethu.
about.localOnlyText: Konke kwenzeka kusiphequluli sakho. Izimpendulo zigcinwa kuphela kudivayisi yakho. Uma usula idatha yesiphequluli, imiphumela yakho iyalahlwa - asinaso isipele.
about.sharingText: Lapho wabelana, idatha yakho ifakwa ku-URL kuphela. Lokho kusho ukuthi noma ubani one-URL angabona imiphumela, kodwa idatha ayidluli kumaseva ethu. Ulawula ukuthi ubani ongayibona ngokusabalalisa noma ukususa i-link.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa i-Cloudflare Web Analytics, isevisi egxile ekucwengweni kobumfihlo engenziwanga amakuki futhi engalandeleli abasebenzisi. Sinikeza izibalo ezihlanganisiwe ezisisiza siqonde ukusetshenziswa ngaphandle kokudicilela ubumfihlo bakho.
about.partiesText: Sibandakanya amaqembu angama-11 abalulekile eNingizimu Afrika, abamele imibono ehlukene esilelayo. Ukukhethwa kusekelwe ekumelaneni kwephalamende, ukubaluleka emazweni okhetho kanye nokuhlukahluka kwemibono.
about.disclaimerText: I-Elekti iyithuluzi lemfundo. Amaqembu anezikhundla ezinzima neziguqukayo. Sincoma ukuthi ufunde ama-manifesto, uye emibuthanweni yomphakathi futhi uqinisekise ulwazi lwethu ngokwakho. Imiphumela ilinganisa ukuvumelana nezikhundla ezikhulunywayo — ukuphatha okusebenzayo kungahluka. Sebenzisa imiphumela njengethuluzi lokuQala, hhayi isinqumo sokugcina.
about.viewDataText: Ngokuzibophezela ekucaceni, ungabuka amafayela ethu e-JSON aqukethe izikhundla zamaqembu, izisindo, nemetadata yemibuzo esetshenzisiwe.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress yiqembu elibusayo eNingizimu Afrika elisekela intando yeningi, uguquko lomphakathi kanye nokunciphisa ukungalingani ngohlelo lukahulumeni.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance iphakamisa ubuholi boluntu obusekwe inkululeko, umnotho wemakethe evulekile kanye nokugxila ekuphathweni okuhle nokudala imisebenzi.

mk.desc: Iqembu uMkhonto weSizwe ligxile ekuguqulweni komnotho okusobala, lixhasa ukuthuthukiswa okuholwa ngurhulumente nokulungiswa kwezingozi zomlando.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters yiqembu elisekela izinguquko ezinzima kwezomnotho, ukwenziwa kwesizwe kanye nokwabiwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwenkokhelo.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ikhulu imele imiphakathi yamaZulu, igxile ekugcinweni kwesiko lamaZulu, ubumbano bezifunda kanye nomnotho wemakethe onomthwalo wokuhlanganyela. Noma inobuso obubanzi, izinqubomgomo zigxile ezinkolweni zamaZulu nasezidingweni zakwaZulu-Natali.

pa.desc: I-Patriotic Alliance igxile ezindabeni zokufuduka, ukukhuthaza ikusasa lezakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika nokubeka phambili izidingo zabahlali.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus ikhulu imele imiphakathi yama-Afrikaner nezintshisekelo zawo, ikhulisa ubumbano bezifunda, amalungelo ezizathu kanye nezindinganiso ezigcinayo. Izinqubomgomo zigxile ekuvikelweni kwamasiko ama-Afrikaner nasekuzilawuleni kwawo.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA ingaphakathi nendawo, igxile ekuphathweni okubhekele izixazululo, ukulwa nenkohlakalo nokukhuthaza ukukhula komnotho ngomkhakha ozimele.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party isekela izindinganiso zobuKristu, izinqubomgomo zomphakathi ezibhekele phambili kanye nentando yeningi yomthethosisekelo.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change igxile ekuhlanganiseni abasebenzi nasemiphakathini yasendaweni nasekuhleleni izixazululo eziphumelelayo.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party isekela ubusoshiyali, amalungelo abasebenzi kanye nokuthuthela komphakathi ekuphathweni kukahulumeni.

q1.text: Uhulumeni kufanele akhuphule intela kwabacebile ukuze exhase izinhlelo zomphakathi ezinde (ezempilo, imfundo, izibonelelo).

q2.text: Ukuzinza kwezezimali nokwehliswa kwesikweletu kazwelonke kufanele kube phezulu ohlwini, noma lokhu kukhawulele izindleko ezintsha zenhlalo.

q3.text: Uhulumeni kufanele asize amabhizinisi amancane naphakathi ngezikhuthazo zentela nokunciphisa imithetho ukuze akhule.

q4.text: Kufanele kusungulwe imali yomvuzo oyisisekelo kazwelonke (universal basic income).

q5.text: Utshalomali kuhlelo lomphakathi olunikeza imisebenzi olunothile kufanele lubhekwe njengendlela yesikhashana yokunciphisa ukungasebenzi.

q6.text: Unakekelo lwezempilo oluxhaswa umphakathi kufanele lunikeze izinsizakalo eziyisisekelo mahhala lapho kudingeka.

q7.text: Imfundo ephakeme kufanele ibe mahhala kubo bonke abafundi, noma kudingeke ukunyuswa kwezintela.

q8.text: Uhulumeni kufanele anikeze izibonelelo ezinqala zokunakekelwa kwezingane ukusekela abazali abasebenzayo.

q9.text: Uhulumeni wendawo kufanele uqashwe ngobuchwepheshe futhi uhlolwe ngokuzimela ukubhekana nezinkinga zikamaspala eziqhubekayo nokunciphisa inkohlakalo, ngisho noma lokhu kunqabela ukuqokwa kwezepolitiki noma kubangela ukungenelela kukahulumeni kazwelonke.

q10.text: Izinsiza ezisemqoka (amandla, amanzi, izitimela) kufanele zihlale zingaphansi kokuphathwa komphakathi kunokuthengiswa.

q11.text: Ukuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwenkokhelo yentengo yemakethe kufanele kuvunyelwe ngaphansi komthetho ukusheshisa ukulungiswa komhlaba.

q12.text: Ukuxhaswa kwezolimo ezincane kanye namalungelo omhlaba omphakathi kufanele kube futhi kusheshe kutholakale uxhaso.

q13.text: Abasebenzi kufanele babe namandla okuhlanganisa amakilabhu nokuhlela ukuhoxa ukuze bavikele amalungelo abo.

q14.text: Amaholide asemqoka okufanele enyuswe kakhulu ukuze kuncishiswe ubumpofu phakathi kwabasebenzi, noma lokhu kungase kuhluphe amabhizinisi amancane.

q15.text: Ukuvumela ukujikeleza okukhulu embonini yezabasebenzi (ukuqashwa nokuxoshwa okulula) kungakhuphula utshalomali futhi kufanele kucatshangelwe.

q16.text: Amaphoyisa kufanele anikezwe amandla nezinsiza ezanele zokulwa ubugebengu obubulalayo, noma lokhu kungenza igunya likahulumeni likhule.

q17.text: Izikhungo ezizimele ezifana nezinkantolo kufanele zivikelwe ngokuqinile, ngisho noma lokhu kunciphisa ukuhamba okusheshayo kwezinkantolo.

q18.text: Ukulandela izigwegwe zenkohlakalo kufanele kube ngokushesha nangokungaguquguquki ngisho noma kuhlanyisa uhlelo lukahulumeni okwamanje.

q19.text: Amalungelo abantu afana nenkululeko yokukhuluma nokubhikisha ngokuthula kufanele abekwe phambili ngisho noma izinkulumo ziphazamisa ukuhamba kwezimoto noma umsebenzi wezomnotho futhi zenza kube nzima imisebenzi yamaphoyisa.

q20.text: Uhulumeni kufanele aqinise ukuvikelwa komthetho kwabantu be-LGBTQ+ futhi aqinisekise ukufakwa kwabo ngokulinganayo.

q21.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke imigomo ebophezela yokwehlisa ukukhishwa kwegesi elahlekisayo futhi igcine phambili ukuncishiswa kokusetshenziswa kwamalahle.

q22.text: Izwe kufanele libeke phambili ukutshalwa kwezimali emandleni avuselelekayo nangokonga amandla ukuze linciphise ukuthembela kumalahle.

q23.text: Imithetho yokuvikela imvelo kufanele ibekwe phambili kunokunikeza indawo yokuthuthukisa izimboni zezimbiwa namalahle.

q24.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele igxile ekukhuliseni ukuthunyelwa kwempahla njengendlela yokukhula ngokwakha ubudlelwano bokuhweba bamazwe ngamazwe.

q25.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele igxile ekuqineni ubudlelwano namazwe ase-Global South kunokuxhumana kuphela namandla aseNtshonalanga.

q26.text: Imigomo yokuhweba kufanele ivikele imboni yasekhaya ngezintela nokuvunywa kwezinto zendalo ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhiqiza kwangaphakathi.

q27.text: Izimali zikahulumeni zengqalasizinda yezokuthutha kufanele zibeke phambili izithutha zomphakathi (izitimela ne-BRT) kunokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo emikhulu emisha, kufaka phakathi ukwandiswa okukhulu eGauteng, ngisho noma lokhu kuphazamisa abashayeli bezimoto noma kunciphisa ukukhula ezindaweni ezithembele ezimotweni.

q28.text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwezindlu ezishibhile kanye nezinhlelo zikahulumeni zifanele ukunikezwa inqubomgomo ephambili.

q29.text: Amadolobha kufanele aphoqelelwe ngomthetho ukuba avimbele ukuthuthukiswa okusha okuphansi, okuncike ezimotweni futhi aphoqelele imithetho yokwehlukanisa izindawo ephoqelela izindawo ezihambeka ngezinyawo, ezixubile—ngisho noma lokhu kukhawulela amalungelo epropathi eyangasese noma kwandise izindleko zezindlu.

q30.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele yamukele imithetho eqinile yobumfihlo bedijithali evimbela ukugadwa yizinkampani nohulumeni.

q31.text: Ukuphepha kokudla kufanele kufezwe ngesicwangciso sikazwelonke esisekela ukukhiqiza kwendawo, indlela yezolimo enobungane bemvelo kanye nezindonga zomphakathi.

q32.text: Eminyangweni kahulumeni kufanele iphoqelelwe ngomthetho ukuthi ihlangabezane nezindinganiso eziqinile zokufinyelela zabantu abakhubazekile, ngisho noma lokhu kusho ukuguqulela izimali ezivela kwezinye izinsizakalo zomphakathi noma ukwandisa umthwalo wemithetho.

q33.text: Uhulumeni kufanele anikeze izikhuthazo ezihlosiwe nezisombululo ezisheshayo zokusheshisa umnotho ezindaweni zasemakhaya nasemadolobheni.

q34.text: INingizimu Afrika kufanele yamukele imithetho eqinile yokuphoqelela abokufika kanye nokulawula imingcele, ngisho noma lokhu kuphazamisa ubudlelwane namazwe omakhelwane noma kunciphisa ukubonelelwa ngabasebenzi ezinhlelweni ezithile.

q35.text: Uhulumeni kufanele alawule kakhulu ukuqashwa kwabokufika abangenawo amadokhumenti, ngisho noma lokhu kuphazamisa izimboni ezithembele kubasebenzi abophambukayo.

q36.text: Amaqembu ezepolitiki kufanele avumelane ezikhundleni zawo zengcinga ukuze akhe ohulumeni beqonga abazinzile, ngisho noma lokhu kukhungathekisa abanye abasekeli.

q37.text: Izinqubomgomo ezifana ne-Employment Equity ne-BEE kufanele zihlale ziyizinsiza eziyinhloko zokubhekana nokungalingani ngokobuhlanga, ngisho noma lokhu kukhawulela ukuguquguquka kwamabhizinisi.

q38.text: Izinkampani zangasese kufanele zivunyelwe ukukhiqiza nokuthengisa ugesi ngokubanzi ukuze kuqedwe ukucinywa kukagesi, ngisho noma lokhu kunciphisa indima ye-Eskom emkhakheni wamandla.

q39.text: Uhulumeni kazwelonke kufanele angenelele kakhulu kumasipala angaphumelelile, ngisho noma lokhu kukhawulela ukuzimela kwentando yeningi yendawo.

q40.text: Izinkulumo eziphazamisayo kanye nokuvala kufanele zibhekane nemikhawulo enamandla yomthetho, ngisho noma lokhu kunqabela izinhlobo ezithile zokukhuluma kwezepolitiki.

q41.text: Abaholi bezepolitiki abaphakamisa esidlangalaleni izinkantolo, izinhlaka zokhetho, noma uMthethosisekelo kufanele babhekane nemiphumela esemthethweni, ngisho noma amazwi abo enziwe njengenkulumo yezepolitiki.
